techmeme.title: An Iranian man pleads guilty in US court to participating in the Robbinhood ransomware gang, compromising networks of US cities and orgs between 2019 and 2024 (Lawrence Abrams/BleepingComputer)
Sources: Apple plans a dedicated app for video games to replace Game Center and come preinstalled on iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Apple TV devices later this year (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Memo: the Trump admin pauses new student visa interviews as it mulls requiring all foreign students applying to study in the US to undergo social media vetting (Nahal Toosi/Politico)
More US states are rolling out subsidies for satellite connectivity in rural areas, including some that have funded programs that exclusively subsidize Starlink (Patience Haggin/Wall Street Journal)
Texas enacts an online child-safety bill requiring app stores verify users' ages and secure parental approval before minors can get most apps or make IAPs (Bloomberg)
